messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Marcie
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/1/00 3:52:24 PM Eastern Daylight Time, kayelle42@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/1/00 3:52:24 PM Eastern Daylight Time, kayelle42@...
writes:

<< To me, the really wonderful thing about hsing, is I get to enjoy my dd
every day - I'm not missing out on half her life due to school and homework.
>>
Amen!!! My 11 year old loves to be read to also; I enjoy it, until my voice
gives out. We are reading in the 4th volume of Joy Hakim's History of US,
and I often read to both my 11 and 6 year old. My oldest loves Harry Potter
as well. We seem to end up in the used book section of Barnes & Noble at
least once a week!

Marcie
